title: Excel Data Upload and Cleaning
description: Verify the system correctly loads and cleans the uploaded Excel dataset, ensuring all critical fields are present and properly mapped.

steps.description: Upload a valid Excel dataset containing historical truck haul cycle data.
System loads data without errors and automatically cleans missing or malformed entries.
Verify all critical fields are present and mapped correctly to internal data structures.
Upload an Excel dataset missing critical fields.
System rejects dataset or provides meaningful error messages indicating missing fields.

title: Dashboard KPI Refresh Performance
description: Ensure that the KPI dashboard refreshes within 2 seconds on datasets with up to 10,000 truck cycle records.

steps.description: Load a dataset with 10,000 truck cycle records.
Navigate to the main KPI dashboard.
KPI dashboard fully renders and refreshes within 2 seconds.

title: M/M/1 Queuing Theory Waiting Time Calculation
description: Validate waiting time calculations correctly implement M/M/1 queuing theory with utilization thresholds and provide realistic waiting time estimates.

steps.description: Input arrival rate and service rate to produce utilization rho < 0.7.
Calculated waiting time matches the standard M/M/1 formula.
Input arrival rate and service rate resulting in 0.7 <= rho < 0.9.
Waiting time is capped to 25 minutes as per threshold.
Input arrival rate and service rate resulting in rho >= 0.9.
Waiting time is capped to 34.8 minutes as per threshold.

title: Multi-site Dump Location Handling
description: Verify the system correctly manages multiple dump locations (FENI KM0 and KM15), applies correct service rates, and produces individual KPIs per site.

steps.description: Configure dump sites with specified service rates for KM0 and KM15.
Upload dataset containing truck cycles for both dump locations.
System calculates and displays waiting times and utilizations separately for each site.
Dashboard KPIs reflect accurate per-site analytics.

title: Discrete-Event Simulation Time Buckets
description: Ensure the discrete-event simulation engine models simulated truck flows using 15-minute time buckets accurately reflecting queue dynamics.

steps.description: Run simulation on a dataset covering multiple hours of operation.
Simulation time progresses in 15-minute increments.
Queue lengths and waiting times update according to simulated truck arrivals and departures per time bucket.

title: Manual Shift-Start Offset Optimization
description: Validate user can manually adjust contractor shift start time offsets and see immediate update of KPIs and visualization reflecting predicted impacts on queuing times.

steps.description: Navigate to optimization panel.
Manually change shift start offset for a contractor.
System updates the discrete-event simulation with new offsets.
Dashboard KPIs and visualizations immediately reflect the new waiting times and utilization.

title: Automated Grid Search Optimization
description: Test the automated optimization algorithm runs a grid search over possible start time offsets and recommends contractor departure times that reduce average dump waiting times.

steps.description: Trigger automated optimization on a dataset.
Grid search runs through defined offset ranges.
System outputs recommended shift start offsets for contractors.
Recommended offsets decrease average wait times compared to baseline.

title: Export Optimized Scheduling to Excel
description: Verify that the exported Excel schedule contains correct contractor offsets and timing data consistent with optimization results, ready for operational use.

steps.description: Perform manual or automated optimization.
Export the optimized schedule.
Excel file downloads without error.
Exported data reflects contractor offsets and timings as shown in the UI.
File format and structure conform to operational requirements.

title: Fleet Configuration Management
description: Ensure users can configure multiple contractors, truck counts, routes, and dump site assignments, and that changes persist and update KPIs accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to fleet configuration panel.
Add, modify or remove contractors, truck counts, routes, and assign dump sites.
Save configuration.
Changes persist after refresh or navigation.
KPI dashboards reflect updated fleet configuration.

title: System Behavior on Missing or Corrupt Excel Data
description: Test system handles missing or corrupt Excel data gracefully without crashing, providing suitable error messages.

steps.description: Upload an Excel file with missing critical columns or corrupted format.
System detects missing or corrupt data.
User is presented with clear error messages instructing on correcting the input.
System does not crash or enter inconsistent state.

title: User Interface Responsiveness on Optimization Inputs
description: Verify that the user interface responds immediately to manual and autonomous optimization input changes by updating KPIs and visualizations.

steps.description: Perform manual shift-start offset change.
KPIs and visualizations update within 2 seconds reflecting new data.
Trigger auto-optimization.
UI updates KPIs and visualizations upon algorithm completion.

title: Real Truck Journey Simulation Accuracy
description: Validate the discrete-event simulation accurately models individual truck journeys including parking, loading, travel and dumping with congestion factors affecting timing.

steps.description: Run simulation on dataset with known truck journeys and travel times.
Simulation outputs realistic timing consistent with input travel and loading times.
Queue lengths and waiting times vary consistent with congestion effects.

title: Service Rate Configuration Validation
description: Ensure the system correctly applies configured service rates for FENI KM0 (8.5 trucks/hour) and KM15 (11.0 trucks/hour) during waiting time and utilization calculations.

steps.description: Check default service rates applied from configuration.
Waiting time and utilization calculations use these rates precisely.
Modify service rates and observe impact on waiting time calculation.
Changes are reflected immediately in simulation and KPIs.
